page.title: 11THE POUND, MALBOROUGH
page.content: {The Pound}is by{Malborough Church.}It is over{two hundred years old.} The pound was used to put{lost animals in.It is made of stone.It is in the shape of a square.It has four{holes}in the wall through which we think animal food was put so they could eat it.Some of the walls have been rebuilt.A sort of {slate slab}is over the holes to stop the walls from falling into the holes. Now there is a{bench}in the Pound where people sit and talk. Also it has got grass growing through the cracks in the concrete. There is also ivy growing on the walls. The Pound is not used for anything now. There used to be a gate there but now there are only the hinges left. There is a big stone where the hinges used to be attached.
